    Package Description
    gov.nasa.worldwind.ogc.collada
    Provides classes for parsing COLLADA files and streams.

    Provides classes for rendering COLLADA documents.

      Creates a Collada root for an untyped source.
      static ColladaRoot ColladaRoot.createAndParse​(java.lang.Object docSource)
      Creates and parses a Collada root for an untyped source.The source must be either a File or a String identifying either a file path or a URL.
      ColladaRoot ColladaAbstractObject.getRoot()
      Overridden to return ColladaRoot instead of a XMLEventParser.
      ColladaRoot ColladaRoot.parse​(java.lang.Object... args)
      Starts document parsing.
      protected ColladaRoot ColladaRoot.parseCachedColladaFile​(java.net.URL url, java.lang.String linkBase)
      Open and parse the specified file expressed as a file: URL..
